players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is a mafioso. We should vote her out."
Bob: " I think we should investigate Charlie to see if he's the mafioso."

Bob: " I think we should vote Charlie out, he's the mafioso. He's been acting suspiciously and his alibis don't add up."
You: "I'm the mafioso, and I killed Diana last night. Charlie has been acting suspiciously, so he might be the detective trying to frame me."
